Earth.title: Earth
Earth.content:
Earth is the third planet in our solar system. It is the only planet known to have life.
History
Earth was formed 4.54 billion years ago.

Mars.title: Mars
Mars.content:
Mars is the fourth planet in our solar system.
History
Mars was formed 4.54 billion years ago.

Solar-system.title: Solar system
Solar-system.content:
The solar system is a system of planets that orbit the sun.
History
The solar system was formed 4.54 billion years ago.
Planets
The solar system has 8 planets:

Mercury
Venus
Earth
Mars
Jupiter
Saturn

index.title: Welcome to your thought map
index.content: Ever topic that you have resarched with your assistant will be saved here. You can check the map of your thoughts that is generated on the right panel.
